definition: can be rated as/can be said to be

sentences.english: The cold overall tone in the image is brilliantly accompanied by the golden in the grass and on the towers.
sentences.chinese: 畫中整體的冷色調連同金黃的草與塔尖，堪稱完美。

sentences.english: This very issue actually renders a bit odd the debate between Qiu and Xue.
sentences.chinese: 這也是秋風與薛湧的論戰堪稱奇怪之處。

sentences.english: As self-actualization messengers, the two men are an odd couple. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 作爲自我實現的傳播者，這兩人堪稱一個奇怪的組合。
簡的烹飪技巧堪稱一絕。

sentences.english: If you are willing to adjust, it's the best computer operating system out there.
sentences.chinese: 如果你願意去適應，它堪稱當前最好的電腦操作系統。

sentences.english: She skated a perfect figure of eight.
sentences.chinese: 她的8字花式溜冰動作堪稱完美。

sentences.english: RIM's reply was one of the most hamfisted PR moves in recent memory.
sentences.chinese: RIM的迴應堪稱近來最糟糕的公關行爲之一。

sentences.english: We call it the dentist's waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以堪稱牙醫的候診室。

sentences.english: The ball Giggsy crossed for Ronaldo was a classic.
sentences.chinese: 吉格斯傳給克里斯迪亞諾的球堪稱經典。

sentences.english: The Buddhist cliff carvings on Kongwang Mountain are regarded as one the world's cultural wonders.
sentences.chinese: 孔望山佛教摩崖造像羣堪稱世界文化的奇觀。

sentences.english: She looks perfect in her wings and fairy costume.
sentences.chinese: 她長着翅膀穿着仙女服的扮相堪稱完美。

sentences.english: Coal-fired power plants are factories of death.
sentences.chinese: 燒煤的火力發電廠堪稱死亡工廠。

sentences.english: The trains carrying coal to power plants are death trains.
sentences.chinese: 將煤炭運輸到發電廠的列車堪稱死亡列車。

sentences.english: The questions arising round Zubu and Tatar may be called a puzzle of the last century.
sentences.chinese: 阻卜與韃靼之謎堪稱一道世紀難題。

sentences.english: There are many different types of drums in Yunnan and colorful tales linked to the drums.
sentences.chinese: 雲南鼓的傳說和種類堪稱中國之最。
